channel.title: Illegal start of type
channel.description: Can someone help me on this error i don't understand whats missing or what i have to add.

item.title: Illegal start of type
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:551425”]“cannot find symbol” quite literally means what it says.

It cannot find the symbol.
Look around in the code and see if it was commented out.
If it wasn’t. Then you need to define it.

Looks like both missing symbols are ints.
So if you can’t find any commented lines where they got commented, define two ints in the class. one being xpCounter, another being expAdded.[/quote]

Nvm buddy just needed to declare all of these thank you so much, now i learned something new! cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal start of type
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

“cannot find symbol” quite literally means what it says.

It cannot find the symbol.
Look around in the code and see if it was commented out.
If it wasn’t. Then you need to define it.

Looks like both missing symbols are ints.
So if you can’t find any commented lines where they got commented, define two ints in the class. one being xpCounter, another being expAdded.

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal start of type
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:551425”][quote author=Justin Bieber link=topic=670341.msg4482473#msg4482473 date=1431161425]
what if there was an opening comment a few lines before that? “helping” people with out-of-context syntax errors doesn’t help them avoid getting the same errors over and over again.
[/quote]
If there was an open comment, there would be completely different errors… (Probably 100 errors because of a missing end bracket)
Or if it was only a partial open comment, then it would show the same error but in a different place for a different symbol.[/quote]

I see, im getting a new error not sure how to fix this at all iv’e been looking all morning!

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal start of type
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Justin Bieber:

what if there was an opening comment a few lines before that? “helping” people with out-of-context syntax errors doesn’t help them avoid getting the same errors over and over again.

If there was an open comment, there would be completely different errors… (Probably 100 errors because of a missing end bracket)
Or if it was only a partial open comment, then it would show the same error but in a different place for a different symbol.

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal start of type
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:551425”]Just remove the “*/” (no quotes)
from line 13422…

how the fuck do we know if you didn’t even post the code at that line?

really dude? read the console. He has symbols for the end of a comment. SMH.[/quote]

oh okay i got ya that makes perfect sense lol thank you

Read full topic
